CustomField.formula:
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Disability_Compensation", IF(Veteran__r.Disability_Percentage__c * 100 < 10, "No Benefits", IF(Veteran__r.Disability_Percentage__c * 100 < 30, "Minimal Benefits", IF(Veteran__r.Disability_Percentage__c * 100 < 50, "Low Benefits", IF(Veteran__r.Disability_Percentage__c * 100 < 70, "Moderate Benefits", IF(Veteran__r.Disability_Percentage__c * 100 < 100, "High Benefits", "Full Benefits") ) ) ) ),
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Pension", IF( OR(Veteran_Age__c >= 65, Permanent_Disability__c), IF(Annual_Income__c <= 20000, "Full Pension", IF(Annual_Income__c <= 30000, "Partial Pension", "Not Eligible")), "Not Eligible" ),
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Healthcare_Benefits", CASE( Health_Insurance_Status__c, "Uninsured", "Full VA Healthcare", "Medicaid", "Partial VA Healthcare", "Other", "Limited VA Benefits", "Unknown" ),
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Education_and_Training", IF( (Veteran__r.Military_Service_End_Date__c - Veteran__r.Military_Service_Start_Date__c) >= 1095, "Full Tuition Assistance", "Partial Tuition Assistance" ),
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Housing_Assistance", IF( AND( Veteran__r.Disability_Percentage__c >= 50, Credit_Score_Provided__c = TRUE ), "Full Housing Assistance", IF( AND(Credit_Score_Provided__c = TRUE, Annual_Income__c <= 30000), "Partial Housing Assistance", "Not Eligible" ) ), "Unknown" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Benefit Level
